decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize the combo cards such as Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Doomsday to set up a winning sequence of cards, ultimately leading to a victory condition with Thassa's Oracle. The deck is focused on quickly assembling the necessary pieces to perform the combo and protect it with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The inclusion of cards like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps with card selection and filtering to reach the combo efficiently. The deck is designed to win in a fast and decisive manner through careful planning and execution of its combo strategy.

This Dimir Tempo deck focuses on utilizing cheap disruptive spells like Daze and Force of Will to control the pace of the game while deploying threats like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower to quickly close out the game. The deck also includes hand disruption like Thoughtseize and removal like Fatal Push to keep the opponent off balance. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and helps dig for key pieces. Wasteland is included to disrupt the opponent's mana base and slow down their game plan. The deck blends aggression with control elements to create a versatile and powerful strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty, Atraxa, and Troll of Khazad-d√ªm, and then use cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Entomb to bring them back onto the battlefield for a quick win. The deck also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze to protect the combo. Additionally, cards like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Brazen Borrower help to dig through the deck and find the combo pieces needed. The inclusion of Wasteland helps to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

This deck revolves around utilizing the combo potential of Nadu, Winged Wisdom, Nomads en-Kor, and Delighted Halfling to quickly generate card advantage and overwhelm the opponent. By manipulating the top of the library with cards like Brainstorm and Green Sun's Zenith, while controlling the game with interaction like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares, the deck aims to create a powerful engine that can generate value and win the game efficiently. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath provide additional disruption and resilience against opposing strategies.

The key concept of this deck is to assemble the combo of Nomads en-Kor and Delighted Halfling to create infinite card draw and mana generation. By looping activations of Nomads en-Kor targeting Delighted Halfling, the deck can draw through its entire library while generating infinite mana. This combo is supported by protection with Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares, as well as value creatures like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck also includes versatile spells like Green Sun's Zenith and Prismatic Ending to deal with a variety of threats.
